food.question: I am yellow, long, and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on trees.
🟡 My color is similar to the sun.
🐒 I am a favorite snack of a certain primate.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me or pour me on your cereal. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am a liquid.
🐮 I come from a farm animal.
🦴 I am good for your bones.

food.question: I am a vegetable that makes some people cry when they cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I have layers.
🍔 I am often on burgers or in soups.
😭 I can make your eyes water.

food.question: I am a fruit that grows in bunches. I can be green, red, or purple. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I am small and round.
🍷 I can be used to make juice or wine.
🌱 I grow on vines.

food.question: I am a grain that is often eaten for breakfast. I can be made into porridge. What am I?

hints.text: 🥣 I am a type of cereal.
🌾 I grow in fields.
👩‍🍳 I am often cooked with milk or water.

food.question: I am a sweet treat made from flour, sugar, and eggs. You often have me on your birthday. What am I?

hints.text: 🎂 You can put candles on me.
🧁 I can come in different flavors, like chocolate or vanilla.
🥄 You usually eat me with a fork or spoon.

food.question: I am a vegetable that is orange and long, and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
🐇 Bugs Bunny loves me.
👀 People say I'm good for your eyesight.

food.question: I am a food made from fermented soybeans. I am often used in stir-fries and salads. What am I?

hints.text: 🍚 I am often eaten with rice.
🌱 I am a good source of protein.
🥢 I am popular in Asian cuisine.

food.question: I am a type of pasta that is shaped like little shells. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 My shape resembles something you'd find on the beach.
🍝 I am often served with sauce.
🥄 You can eat me with a spoon or a fork.

food.question: I am a type of cheese that is often used on pizza. What am I?

hints.text: 🇮🇹 I am a soft, white cheese from Italy.
🧀 I am made from buffalo milk.
🍕 I melt easily.

plant.question: I have roots, but no feet. I help the earth but have no hands. I wear a crown, but I'm not a king. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I'm very tall and live for a long time.
☀️ I give you shade on a sunny day.
🍂 I lose my leaves in the fall.

plant.question: I am a small green houseplant that is easy to care for. People say I bring good luck! What am I?

hints.text: ☘️ I am often given as a gift
🏠 People keep me inside
🍀 I have round leaves.

plant.question: I am a food that comes from a plant. Bugs Bunny loves to eat me. I am orange and grow underground. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 You can eat me raw or cooked.
🐇 I'm good for your eyesight.
🟠 My color is like the sun.

plant.question: I am a flower that follows the sun. I'm tall and yellow, and my seeds are yummy. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 My name has to do with a celestial body.
☀️ I always face the brightest star during the day
🌱 Birds love to eat my seeds.

plant.question: I am a plant with sharp thorns and beautiful, fragrant flowers. People often give me as a gift to show they care. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 My name has to do with love.
🌷 I come in many colors, like red, pink, and white.
🛡️ Be careful of my pointy parts!

plant.question: I am a tall plant that grows in water. People use me to make paper. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I grow in wet places.
🦢 Some animals build their nests in me.
📖 I am used to create paper.

plant.question: I am a seed that is commonly used to make flour. I am used in breads, cakes, and many other foods. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I grow in fields.
🍞 I am used to make bread.
⚙️ I am often grounded into a powder.

plant.question: I am a spiky plant that lives in dry places. I store water inside me. Some people think I am a type of tree. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I'm well-suited for hot weather.
🏜️ I grow in deserts
💧 I can go a long time without water.

plant.question: I am a vine that produces a sweet purple fruit. You can eat me raw, or make juice or jelly from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow in bunches.
🍷 I can be fermented.
💜 I am usually purple, but can be green.

plant.question: I am a very large flower that smells like rotting meat. I have no true leaves, stems, or roots. What am I?

hints.text: ☠️ My smell keeps humans away, but attracts insects.
🌏 I am found in Southeast Asia.
💐 I am a parasite.
